thread.title: Kim Kardashian and North head to ballet in NYC
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian and North head to ballet in NYC | Daily Mail Online

author: Heidi Parker
title: Kim Kardashian and North head to ballet in NYC

organizations.name: lincoln center for the performing arts

text:
Kim Kardashian and North West had a mommy-and-me date night on Tuesday evening.
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians reality star was seen taking her daughter, aged three, to a performance of Swan Lake at the Lincoln Center For The Performing Arts in New York City .
While the Selfish author, 36, wore a sport royal blue velour outfit, her mini me stood out in a bright yellow neon look that she helped her parents Kim and Kanye West design.
Scroll down for video
Two kute: Kim Kardashian and North West had a mommy-and-me date night on Tuesday when they went to see Swan Lake at the Lincoln Center For The Performing Arts in New York City
Sporty dressy: Kim appeared to be wearing a West-designed Yeezy velour suit comprised of track pants and an oversized parka jacket
Gift your girl a glittery dress like North West's Yeezy sequin girls dress
Not yet available
Buy now
North West is one cute little lady and she looked even more adorable in this pretty dress paired with trainers.
Sporting an ensemble from the upcoming Yeezy children's line which Kim was involved with, North looks to be loving her look.
North worked a cosy shearling jacket and sequin dress in the same yellow hue and finished off her look with pulled up white socks and her favourite trainers: Vans hi-tops.
We love this look and can't wait to see what awaits from his upcoming line. Kim even mentioned that North was involved in picking the colours. It was a whole family affair!
Shop the current Yeezy line via the link on the right (for grown ups) at MyTheresa and shop our childrenswear edit below to treat your precious princess to a sparkly sequin dress just like North's.

Standing out: North wore a bright yellow sequined dress with a mock turtleneck
Swan Lake is a classic ballet from George Balanchine with music by Peter Ilyitch Tschaikovsky.
Kim appeared to be wearing a West-designed Yeezy velour suit comprised of track pants and an oversized parka jacket.
The former Playboy cover girl added some sex appeal with a tight tube top.
And on her feet were a pair of pointy beige lace-up Yeezy boots that she has been seen with many times before.
The daughter of Kris Jenner, 61, was heavily flanked by security guards, which has become the new norm for the TV icon after her frightening October robbery in Paris that left her bound and gagged.
North wore a bright yellow sequined dress with a mock turtleneck.
Cool clothes: And on top the little E! star had on a dark yellow leather hoodie jacket. The cutie also wore black sneakers with white socks
Loving the attention: The child beamed as she stood outside the Cadillac SUV that was transporting her
String mommy: Here Kim is seen lifting the little girl before getting in the vehicle
And on top the little E! star had on a dark yellow leather hoodie jacket.
The cutie also wore black sneakers with white socks. And she had her hair up in little pigtail buns.
The child beamed as she stood outside the Cadillac SUV that was transporting her.
At one point Kim was seen lifting the little girl before getting in the vehicle.
North's look had been seen earlier in several Snapchat clips taken inside Kim's car.
The Vogue cover model revealed that the couple's toddler lent a helping hand by picking out the color and fabric of the first outfit from Kim and hubby, Kanye West's upcoming children's clothing line.
Bonding: The mother-of-two was seen in the car on the way to the theater with her child
Coming soon! Kim took to Snapchat to unveil she and husband Kanye West's new kids clothing line on Tuesday. North West modeled the first outfit which she helped design
In the candid social media video little North looked precious as she showed off her new outfit, which she helped design.
Kim captioned one snapshot of North with: 'Kanye & my kids line coming soon!'
In the video, North looked happy as she modeled the look.
The adorable tot wore her hair in two side top knots and showed off her bubbly personality as well as her new duds.
Kim addressed her 'silly girl' who was playing by sweetly asking, 'Wait, let me see this outfit you've got on.'
The savvy star prompted her little one: 'Is that a Yeezy yellow shearling coat?'
'Silly girl': Kim addressed her 'silly girl' who was playing by sweetly asking, 'Wait, let me see this outfit you've got on'
She's a model! In the video, the three-year-old modeled a shiny sequined highlighter yellow dress along with a coordinating chartreuse-colored shearling coat
'I'm here!' Kim continued to attempt to get North's attention: 'Hey where's our model?'
Kim continued to attempt to get North's attention: 'Hey where's our model?'
'I'm here!' North exclaimed with a big smile.
Kim responded: 'Say, daddy and mommy are doing a kids line and these are some of the pieces.'
'Northie picked out the colors and the fabric,' the proud mother-of-two added.
Kim responded: 'Say, daddy and mommy are doing a kids line and these are some of the pieces'
She's a designer too! 'Northie picked out the colors and the fabric,' the proud mama added
She's a pro: At one point, the little model made the coffee table her very own runway
'Is that a Yeezy yellow shearling coat?' The savvy star prompted her little one
At one point, the little model made the coffee table her very own runway.
Later, Kim continued to update her followers with more candid snaps of she and her daughter.
Kim and North looked cute as they played around with all the app's filters.
Child's play: Following their meal at Italian restaurant Cipriani, Kim and BFF Jonathan Cheban were seen shopping for kids stuff with a male friend.
Happy to be here: The pair appeared to be enjoying their outing, and neither could wipe the broad grins off their faces
The next day, Kim was seen stepping out for lunch with her longtime BFF, Jonathan Cheban, 42.
After grabbing a meal at Cipriani, the pair - both clad in sunglasses - went shopping for kids clothes with a male friend.
Seemingly enjoying herself, Kim shared video from their outing with her fans on Snapchat, with the brunette bombshell dressed warmly in a long brown fur coat.
Snapping selfies: The reality star captured her lunch with friends, including Jonathan, sharing video on Snapchat
Pout and about: The brunette beauty hammed it up for the camera during a lunch with friends, including La La Anthony in New York City
It quickly became a group outing, with Kim and Jonathan meeting up with another friend, La La Anthony.
The 37-year-old joined her friends in an all-black outfit, which included a jacket with gold detailing and red and white patchworks on the sleeves.
Her low-cut T-shirt emphasized her ample cleavage.
Walk this way: La La Anthony - seen here with Jonathan Cheban - joined her friends on their shopping expedition
Adults only: Kim left North at home when she stepped out in New York accompanied by her BFFs, Jonathan and La La
Meanwhile, after keeping a relatively low-profile, Yeezy is set to have a fashion comeback.
The 39-year-old will unveil his Yeezy Season 5 range as part of New York Fashion Week, according to a Tuesday report from Fashionista .
It will not be as grandiose as his last two presentations, however, as the site claims it will be happening at Pier 59 Studios in the Chelsea Piers neighbourhood of Manhattan which is a popular place for events that week.
Workin' it! The adorable tot wore her hair in two side top knots and showed off her bubbly personality as well as her new duds
Close up look! The beautiful girl loved modeling her bright yellow ensemble for her famous mama who filmed the entire interaction
Kanye last unveiled his Yeezy Season 4 fashion range in collaboration with Adidas with an intricate outdoor presentation on Roosevelt Island back in September.
It was quite the memorable occasion as the lengthy catwalk show saw several models fainting due to the heat, while others tripped up on the runway.
Before that the Famous rapper unveiled the Yeezy Season 3 line with a huge show at Madison Square Garden in February of last year.
Later: Kim continued to update her followers with more candid snaps of she and her daughter
Pretty bunny! Kim and North looked cute as they played around with all the app's filters
It was at that presentation where West also unveiled his hit album The Life Of Pablo.
With the change in venue no doubt it will have more a fashion studio feel like his Yeezy Season 1 and 2 presentations.
Meanwhile, it has been quite a trying few months for the rapper and family as Kim was robbed of over $8.5 million worth of jewelry by gunpoint inside her room at the No Address Hotel in Paris back in early October.
Then in November, Kanye was rushed to hospital in Los Angeles after a psychotic breakdown, thought to be brought on by exhaustion.
The Stronger hit-maker seems to be doing much better as an insider told Entertainment Tonight on Tuesday that he has been staying busy but not taking on new projects yet.
'Kanye is doing a lot better. He stays to his schedule,' the source added. 'The family and Kim are trying to do everything they can to assure he doesn’t have another episode.'
Kim and Kanye also have a one-year-old son named Saint.
Yeezus has risen! Kanye West will unveil his Yeezy Season 5 range as part of New York Fashion Week according to a Tuesday report from Fashionista
